name: The Red Page Murder
description:
You play as a budding detective in the 1920s and your dinner host has been brutally murdered. The chief detective has given you a few hours to gather up clues and question the suspects, can you weave fact from fiction to discover the truth? Find out in this relatively short text adventure created for the game developers IMC class

MUSIC
Half Mystery by Kevin MacLeod
